thought: The website is accessible. Now I need to check for unusually low prices, claims of free, and other characteristics of scam websites.
observation: ­  Bway.net | NYC High Speed Internet Service Provider CALL US 212.982.9800 Webmail Home Services Fiber Internet Voice over IP Business Internet Residential/Small Office Internet Networking Services Email Services Support About Us Contact Us New York City’s Best Internet Service Provider Since 1995. Not only are we a high speed internet service provider, we solve networking and technology challenges for every device connected to the internet. Get A Quote Now! Our Services Business internet via Ethernet, Fiber, or Fixed Wireless installed quickly - speeds from 10Mb/s to 10 Gb/s. Point to point and multipoint solutions are also available. VoIP Voice over IP has never sounded so clear.  Our hosted PBX services deliver value and features beyond consumer voice services.  From 2 seats to 200, we're ready to bring your phone system up to date. Office Network Setup Hands-on white-glove service at its best. We consult, install structured cabling, networking gear, and carrier-grade WiFi Access Points. Contact us for a survey and quote. Home Internet Bway Home Internet provides low latency, non-shared connections allowing you to stream Internet TV and audio and participate in online gaming without any hiccups or overage charges. What makes Bway.net BEST 20 Years Experience We have been providing ISP services before there was a Verizon or Time Warner Cable, circa 1995. We know the New York Metro market and infrastructure. 24/7/365 Network Monitoring The Bway network is monitored 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year.  We provide proactive support and our technical alert system keeps us ahead of any problems. 99.999% Uptime Uptime and reliability implemented via redundant carriers, servers and networking equipment. Local Human Support At Bway, real humans pick up the phone - no menus, no arguing with different tiers of support, no overseas call centers.  We're happy to discuss what we can do to solve your problem or improve your network. What our clients say about us "Bway offers amazing reliable and fast service. Internet you can rely on. Ali H. "Bway is simply everything good left in this world. A human touch to the service with actual interaction with people you can get to know. " "Bway is worth every penny. "It's refreshing to have an ISP that understands the specific needs of your company and cares to make sure you always have the best connection provided." Heather S. “Bway provides fast, dependable Internet. The savvy, friendly staff are always available and quick to provide support whenever needed." "I've been a customer of Bway for about 4 years now.  I've always had great customer service and there is an actual in office employee who answers the phone every time I call. Support local business and give these guys a shot.  Their prices are competitive and the service is more consistent than the big guys." Brian S. “This is the best internet provider I've had so far in NYC.  I had a variety of Time Warner cable modem connections in different parts of town for years and suffered through all sorts of problems, including unreliable connections, slow speeds, unknowledgeable techs (both on-site and on the phone) and all other sorts of nonsense." Will M. 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 Thousands previous next Is Bway internet available in your area? All rights reserved.

thought: The website seems to be a high-speed internet service provider. I don't see any characteristics of scam websites such as unusually low prices, claims of free, or non-existent companies. However, I should check the privacy policy, payment methods, and company information to be sure.
The website does not have any additional hyperlinks to check for privacy policy, payment methods, or company information. I should check the WHOIS information to see if the company is legitimate.
